content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Completed Headquarters
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] A new version of the player headquarters, featuring six snap points 60 degrees offset from one another. Inspired by JL's HQ_02, but created entirely from modifying vanilla assets.
content.author: LangyMD
